USAboundaries
  • Reference
  • News

Zip Code Tabulation Areas (contemporary)

Get the current (2016) centroids for U.S Zipcode Tabulation Areas from the U.S. Census Bureau. The centroids were calculated from the ZCTA boundary files available on the U.S. Census Bureau website.

us_zipcodes()

Value

An sf object.

See also

For documentation of and citation to the underlying shapefiles for contemporary data from the U.S. Census Bureau, see census_boundaries.

Examples

if (require(USAboundariesData)) {
  us_zipcodes()
}
#> Simple feature collection with 33144 features and 6 fields
#> geometry type:  POINT
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -176.6316 ymin: -14.22075 xmax: 145.7536 ymax: 71.2738
